author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Correctly retrieve the comment field from the lock.
Now passes lock_tests #21 (examine the fields of a lock from a URL).
(lock_info_t): Remove owner, creation_date, lock_token, comment as they
(start_lock): Map 'owner' DAV field to the COMMENT state.
(end_lock): Fill the ->comment field in the lock.
